text: Anne Wiazemsky (14 May 1947 â€“ 5 October 2017la romanciere et actrice Anne Wiazemsky est morte in Le monde) was a French actress and novelist. She appeared in Robert Bresson's Au Hasard Balthazar (1966) and in Jean-Luc Godard's movies La Chinoise (1967), Week End (1967) and One Plus One (1968). She and Godard were married from 1967 to 1979. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1947 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in France Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:French novelists Category:Writers from Berlin
title: Anne Wiazemsky
